title: [Large-scale] Self-regulated Learning Strategy Development for Workplace Learning Transition

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational job competencies and domain expertise
context.additional_context: A program focused on strengthening self-regulated learning competencies for professionals adapting to new workplace environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more self-regulated learning strategies—including goal setting, time management, and self-assessment—in workplace learning environments.
Learners can identify required job competencies through workplace context analysis and establish learning plans accordingly.
Learners can improve their learning process based on peer feedback and demonstrate metacognition necessary for workplace adaptation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
